text: The men's 4x400 metres relay event at the 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Seoul, Korea, at Olympic Stadium on 19 and 20 September. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| William Porter Milton Mallard Regan Nichols Deon Minor ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Greg Haughton Edward Clarke Davian Clarke Carl McPherson ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Hiroyuki Hayashi Tadashi Nishihata Tomonari Ono Takayuki Sudo ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 20 September {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 1992 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 4 × 400 metres relay
